(ROOT
  (SQ (VBP Do)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VB know)
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (NN someone))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP who))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (ADVP (RB just))
                (ADJP (RB plain) (JJ fussy))))))))
    (. ?)))


aux(know-3, Do-1)
nsubj(know-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, know-3)
prep(know-3, of-4)
pobj(of-4, someone-5)

cop(fussy-10, is-7)
advmod(fussy-10, just-8)
advmod(fussy-10, plain-9)
rcmod(someone-5, fussy-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP mean)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (DT these) (NNS people))
          (VP (MD can)
            (ADVP (RB rightly))
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN called)
                (S (`` ``)
                  (NP (NNP Food) (NNP Narcissists))
                  ('' '')))))))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where) (RB only))
        (S
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ own) (NN cooking))
            (CC or)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ own) (NN mother) (POS 's))
              (NN cooking)))
          (VP (VBZ has)
            (VP (VBN got)
              (NP (JJ enough) (NN power))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB trigger)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ pleasurable) (NN response))
                    (PP (IN from)
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS tastebuds)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(mean-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, mean-2)
det(people-4, these-3)
nsubjpass(called-8, people-4)
aux(called-8, can-5)
advmod(called-8, rightly-6)
auxpass(called-8, be-7)
ccomp(mean-2, called-8)
nn(Narcissists-11, Food-10)
dep(called-8, Narcissists-11)
advmod(only-14, where-13)
advmod(got-25, only-14)
poss(cooking-17, their-15)
amod(cooking-17, own-16)
nsubj(got-25, cooking-17)
cc(cooking-17, or-18)
poss(mother-21, their-19)
amod(mother-21, own-20)
poss(cooking-23, mother-21)
possessive(mother-21, 's-22)
conj(cooking-17, cooking-23)
aux(got-25, has-24)
advcl(mean-2, got-25)
amod(power-27, enough-26)
dobj(got-25, power-27)
aux(trigger-29, to-28)
xcomp(got-25, trigger-29)
det(response-32, a-30)
amod(response-32, pleasurable-31)
dobj(trigger-29, response-32)
prep(trigger-29, from-33)
poss(tastebuds-35, their-34)
pobj(from-33, tastebuds-35)

      (NP (DT a) (NN hotter) (NN climate)))

      (WHADVP (WRB where))
      (S
        (NP (NN meat))
        (VP (VBZ turns)
          (ADJP (JJ bad))
          (ADVP (RB quickly)))))
    (, ,)))

cc(good-7, and-8)
det(prices-10, the-9)
nsubj(reasonable-13, prices-10)
cop(reasonable-13, are-11)
advmod(reasonable-13, pretty-12)
conj(good-7, reasonable-13)
cc(reasonable-13, and-14)
det(place-16, the-15)
nsubj(have-18, place-16)
aux(have-18, does-17)
conj(reasonable-13, have-18)
det(feeling-20, a-19)
dobj(have-18, feeling-20)
prep(feeling-20, of-21)
pobj(of-21, authenticity-22)
prep(authenticity-22, about-23)
pobj(about-23, it-24)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (CC And)
    (PP (IN at)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN end))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN day))
            (, ,)))))))


root(ROOT-0, And-1)
prep(And-1, at-2)
det(end-4, the-3)
pobj(at-2, end-4)
prep(end-4, of-5)
det(day-7, the-6)
pobj(of-5, day-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (ADVP (IN at) (JJS least))
        (NP (DT a) (NN place))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (NNP Mr.) (NNP YaKwang))
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (VP (VBG raving)
                (PP (IN about)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT the) (NN food))
                    (PP (RB instead) (IN of)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG lamenting)
                          (PP (IN about)
                            (SBAR
                              (WHADVP (WRB how))
                              (S
                                (NP
                                  (NP (JJ sad) (DT the) (NN state))
                                  (PP (IN of)
                                    (NP (NNP Singapore) (NN food))))
                                (VP (VBZ is)
                                  (ADVP (RB nowadays)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(place-6, it-1)
cop(place-6, is-2)
advmod(place-6, at-3)
pobj(at-3, least-4)
det(place-6, a-5)
root(ROOT-0, place-6)
advmod(raving-11, where-7)
nn(YaKwang-9, Mr.-8)
nsubj(raving-11, YaKwang-9)
aux(raving-11, is-10)
rcmod(place-6, raving-11)
prep(raving-11, about-12)
det(food-14, the-13)
pobj(about-12, food-14)
advmod(of-16, instead-15)
prep(food-14, of-16)
pcomp(of-16, lamenting-17)
prep(lamenting-17, about-18)
advmod(is-26, how-19)
amod(state-22, sad-20)
det(state-22, the-21)
nsubj(is-26, state-22)
prep(state-22, of-23)
nn(food-25, Singapore-24)
pobj(of-23, food-25)
pcomp(about-18, is-26)
advmod(is-26, nowadays-27)
